name: Kaynã de Camargo
intro: Software engineer with +5 Years of experience on a very diverse background, consisting in SAAS, Management, and other fields. I’m interested in IA & Rust development and in my free time I work on these skills mainly by developing small, public projects on Github. My current goal is skilling up in IA and ML fields, and possibly working on tools in these fields on a fast and memory safe language - such as Rust.
